resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/495</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/495</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Fem química! Canvis de color</string>
            <string language="en">Colour changes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Änderungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changements de couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudanças da cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamenti di colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγές χρώματος</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Fitxa de la col·lecció Fem química! sobre un experiment amb substàncies naturals que produeixen canvis de color a una dissolució de col llombarda. La fitxa conté un vídeo, el guió de la pràctica i qüestions amb resposta sobre l'experiment.</string>
            <string language="en">An experiment with natural substances that produce a colour change in a dissolution of red cabbage. A video, the instructions for the experiment and questions (with answers) on the experiment are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">química</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">experiment</string>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
            <string language="es">experimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Experiment mit natürlichen Substanzen, die 
eine Farbe Änderung in einer Auflösung des roten Kohls produzieren. 
Ein Bildschirm, die Anweisungen für das Experiment und die 
Fragen (mit Antworten) über das Experiment sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une expérience avec les substances normales qui 
produisent un changement de couleur d'une dissolution de chou rouge. 
Un vidéo, les instructions pour l'expérience et les questions 
(avec des réponses) sur l'expérience sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma experiência com substâncias naturais que 
produzem uma mudança da cor em uma dissolução do repolho vermelho. 
Um vídeo, as instruções para a experiência e as perguntas 
(com respostas) na experiência são incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un esperimento con le sostanze naturali che 
producono un cambiamento di colore in una dissoluzione di cavolo 
rosso. Un video, le istruzioni per l'esperimento e le domande 
(con le risposte) sull'esperimento sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα πείραμα με τις φυσικές ουσίες που παράγουν μια 
αλλαγή χρώματος σε μια διάλυση του κόκκινου λάχανου. Ένα 
βίντεο, οι οδηγίες για το πείραμα και οι ερωτήσεις (με τις 
απαντήσεις) στο πείραμα συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
